Class GamePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hexxagon.Model.GamePlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGamePlay, Serializable

    public final class GamePlay
extends Object
implements IGamePlay
    It stores the actual state of the game board

    2.0 (1.0)
